pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sale Invoice Grouping Module############################The ``sale_invoice_grouping`` module adds an option to define how invoice linesgenerated from sales will be grouped.A field is added to the *Party*:- *Sale Invoice Grouping Method*: The method used when grouping invoice lines.If the Standard method is used, invoice lines generated will be added to thefirst matching invoice found. If no invoice matches sale attributes then a newone will be created. Invoices not created by the sale process are not takeninto account when looking for a candidate invoice to add invoice lines to.
